summary: This mod makes Ulfric\'s outfit, when worn by a female character, look similar to the outfit as it appears when worn by males.
descriptionHtml:
Finally a female version of Ulfric\'s clothes! This mod makes Ulfric\'s outfit, when worn by a female character, look similar to the outfit as it appears when worn by males.

Previously when a female character would wear Ulfric\'s clothes, her outfit would look identical to that of the other female Jarls: brown with a orange fox cloak. But now Ulfric\'s clothes match the male version when worn by a female character, having the metal chest plate, dark blue cloth, chain mail skirt and the near black fox pelt. A proper retexture!

This outfit also adds a pair of gloves and boots, reshaped to fit your female character, while matching the male appearance by sporting the trademark metallic leg and arm bracers Ulfric wears. The mod includes both retextured diffuse- and normal maps. The male version of the outfit remains unchanged.

Patch Notes

V1.1: Weight sliders fixed for all races.
V2.0: Now with a chainmail covering the skirt and dark sleeves, similar to the male version.
author: Sara
